channel.title: Problem running a client please help
channel.description:
Whenever i try to run a client that works for my friend i get this message,
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
what do i need to do to fix this?

item.title: Problem running a client please help
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

LOL on your run.bat or whatever is it click edit then search the your java jdk version and then find the run.bat’s java version change it to yours:P

Read full topic
